prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to steal shiny objects and has a mischievous grin.
Imagine a small feline Pokemon with large ears and a unique golden coin on its forehead.
Design a cute and agile Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and is always on the lookout for treasure.
Generate a cartoon-style Pokemon that has fluffy paws and a charming smile, perfect for kids.
Make a feline-inspired Pokemon with expressive eyes and a sleek body, known for its cunning nature.
Show me a quirky Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a cat and loves to nap in the sun.
Give me an illustration of a Pokemon with a distinct coin feature, symbolizing luck and fortune.
